ideas = {
	##############################################
	###### Factory Production Bonuses Ideas ######

#### Uniform Factory ####
	uniform_factory = {
		uniformfactory1= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

#### Small Arms and Equipment Factories ####
	smallarms_factory = {
		smallarmsfactory1 = {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				infantry_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				garrison_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HQ_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				SMG_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HMG_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				sniper_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				assault_rifle_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				handheld_at_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				urbanwar_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				para_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				amph_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				mount_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				desert_equip = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				jungle_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				horse_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				support_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				recon_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				flamethrowers = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
			}

#### Vehicle Factories ####
	truck_factory = {
		truckfactory1 = {

			allowed = {
				always = no
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				motorized_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_AC_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_lia_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				#motorized_HT_equipment = {
				#	build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				#}
				mechanized_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artytruck_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artytractor_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				motorized_rocket_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				recon_mot_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				reconac_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
			}
		}

#### Artillery Factory ####
	artillery_factory = {
		artilleryfactory1= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				anti_air_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HVanti_air_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				anti_tank_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				HVanti_tank_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				artillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				mountain_artillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				medartillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				Hvartillery_equipment = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				superartillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				rocket_artillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				infantrygun_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				mortar_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
				railartillery_equipment  = {
					build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
				}
			}
		}
		artilleryfactory2= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			equipment_bonus = {

				anti_air_equipment = {

	### GER - Armored Vehicle Factories ###
			GER_tankfactory1= {

			  allowed = {
			    always = no
			    original_tag = GER
			  }

			  allowed_civil_war = {
			    always = yes
			  }

			  equipment_bonus = {

			    tankette_equipment = {

	### FRA - Armored Vehicle Factories ###
			FRA_tankfactory1 = {

			  allowed = {
			    always = no # Triggered via event
			  }

			  allowed_civil_war = {
			    always = yes
			  }

			  equipment_bonus = {

			    tankette_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    gw_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_light_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_light_cavalry_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_cavalry_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_infantry_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_medium_tank_equipment  = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_heavy_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_superheavy_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_light_main_tank_equipment  = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_main_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_tank_destroyer_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_medium_art_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_spart_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    fra_ag_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }

			    ### Command and Recovery Tanks ###
			    command_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			    recovery_tank_equipment = {
			      build_cost_ic = -0.053 instant = yes
			    }
			  }
			}

#### Ammo Factory ###
	ammo_factory = {
		ammofactory1= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			traits = {
				ammo_factory_1
			}
		}
		ammofactory2= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			traits = {
				ammo_factory_2
			}
		}
		ammofactory3= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			traits = {
				ammo_factory_3
			}
		}
		ammofactory4= {

			allowed = {
				always = no # Triggered via event
			}

			allowed_civil_war = {
				always = yes
			}

			traits = {
				ammo_factory_4
			}
		}

	### JAP - Heavy Aircraft Factory ###
		JAP_hvaircraftfactory1 = {

		  allowed = {
		    always = no # Triggered via event
		  }
